name: Queensland Student Report
description: Queensland school report format aligned with Australian Curriculum

achievement_scale.label: Outstanding
achievement_scale.description: Your child has demonstrated an exceptional level of knowledge and understanding of the content and concepts.

achievement_scale.label: High
achievement_scale.description: Your child has demonstrated a thorough knowledge and understanding of the content and concepts.

achievement_scale.label: Sound
achievement_scale.description: Your child has demonstrated a sound knowledge and understanding of the content and concepts.

achievement_scale.label: Developing
achievement_scale.description: Your child has demonstrated a basic knowledge and understanding of the content and concepts.

achievement_scale.label: Support Required
achievement_scale.description: Your child has demonstrated a limited knowledge and understanding of the content and concepts.

effort_scale.label: High
effort_scale.description: Consistently demonstrates high effort in class activities and learning tasks.

effort_scale.label: Satisfactory
effort_scale.description: Usually demonstrates satisfactory effort in class activities and learning tasks.

effort_scale.label: Low
effort_scale.description: Demonstrates inconsistent effort in class activities and learning tasks.

work_habits: Is organized and prepared for learning
Completes tasks to the best of their ability
Works independently and manages time effectively
